law.catch_line: Department's budget requests to be submitted to state board.
law.text: Prior to submission of the formal budgetary requests of the Department of Education, established in KRS 156.010, to the Governor and executive branch, complete copies of the budget areas in the board's jurisdiction shall be forwarded to the Kentucky Board of Education to enable it to fully investigate and review said requests and make recommendations to the Governor.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 46, effective July 1, 1990; and ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 126, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 103, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/13/90). This section was amended by two 1990 Acts which are in conflict. Pursuant to KRS 446.250, the Act which was last enacted by the General Assembly prevails.
